A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is ostensibly an okay movie. At face value\, it was a popcorn thriller. But as a star wars devotee\, I was horrified. This film sticks out in the star wars saga like a sore thumb\, in the worst way. In TLJ\, Rian Johnson took the franchise to preposterous new levels that\, at times\, were outright far-fetched. TLJ is a piddling fan-fiction that has defiled the franchise. I left the theatre feeling forlorn and broken. I doubt JJ Abrams can amend this hot garbage. If you didn't think Star Wars was already dead\, this was the definitive nail in the coffin.
